history.proof: intros d p H. qauto use: borne_0, borne_1, Nat.le_trans unfold: state_in_dta, prec_in_dta, prec_in_state.

original: intros d p H. unfold prec_in_dta, taille_0, DTA_taille in H. destruct H as [s [a [c [H1 H2]]]]. rewrite H2. apply Nat.add_le_mono_l. apply borne_1. exists s. apply H1.
